item.title: Spammer 3000! V.1
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Hacker1 Rune Hacker
item.description:
@Rune_Hacker1 wrote:

Yay, just what ive always needed, a script that will get my autoers banned!!! Nah, jkin lol, not bad, ive just seen so many autotypers, you should make a unique script, but still, not bad.

item.title: Spammer 3000! V.1
item.dc:creator: @robbee robbee
item.description:
@robbee wrote:

DONT USE ON RS
basically it has directions in the code.

{.Script Info:
# ScriptName  = Spammer 3000
# Author      = Robbee
# Description = over 20 different Messages you can set.
# Version     = 1.0
# Date        = April 20,2007
# Comments    = Worked Hard On
# Directions  = Replace write NAME HERE with whatever name you want.
then change all the messages u want for example
message1 ='hi how are you? my name is' +Name; you can change that to
what ever you want.
/Script Info}
program robbeetyper3000;
const
     Name = 'Write NAME HERE';
message1 ='hi how are you? My name is'+Name;
message2 ='Well Im doing good';
message3 ='im bored';
message4 ='what should i do today?!?!?';
message5 ='well...';
message6 ='i dono';
message7 ='Im trying out my auto talker';
message8 ='It is kinda a spammer';
message9 ='but i made it from scratch';
message10 ='It will make like 40 different messages when im done with it';
message11 ='Thats it im naming it SPAMMER 3000 cause this thing spams.';
message12 ='alot!';
message13 ='wow';
message14 ='this may take awile';
message15 ='but its going to be really famous';
message16 ='because there hasnt been this much';
message17 ='messagez you could make';
message18 ='on one auto talker!';
message19 ='its going to be amazing';
message20 ='wow';
message21 ='what do you plan on doing today?';
message22 ='well today is most likely going to be a boring day';
message23 ='for me';
message24 ='well this is a waste of a weekend.';
message25 ='wow spammer 3000 is going to make alot of different messages';
message26 ='i dono if i wanna make 40 different messages';
message27 ='this is kinda Cool.';
begin
  Writeln('5');
wait(1000)
  Writeln('4');
wait(1000)
  Writeln('3');
wait(1000)
  Writeln('2');
wait(1000)
  Writeln('Robbeez auto talker ON');
repeat
wait(5000)
sendkeys(message1 + chr(13));
wait(684)
sendkeys(message2 + chr(13));
wait(684)
sendkeys(message3 + chr(13));
wait(684)
sendkeys(message4 + chr(13));
wait(684)
sendkeys(message5 + chr(13));
wait(684)
sendkeys(message6 + chr(13));
wait(684)
sendkeys(message7 + chr(13));
wait(684)
sendkeys(message8 + chr(13));
wait(684)
sendkeys(message9 + chr(13));
wait(684)
sendkeys(message10 + chr(13));
wait(684)
sendkeys(message11 + chr(13));
wait(684)
sendkeys(message12 + chr(13));
wait(684)
sendkeys(message13 + chr(13));
wait(684)
sendkeys(message14 + chr(13));
wait(684)
sendkeys(message15 + chr(13));
wait(684)
sendkeys(message16 + chr(13));
wait(684)
sendkeys(message17 + chr(13));
wait(684)
sendkeys(message18 + chr(13));
wait(684)
sendkeys(message19 + chr(13));
wait(684)
sendkeys(message20 + chr(13));
wait(684)
sendkeys(message21 + chr(13));
wait(684)
sendkeys(message22 + chr(13));
wait(684)
sendkeys(message23 + chr(13));
wait(684)
sendkeys(message24 + chr(13));
wait(684)
sendkeys(message25 + chr(13));
wait(684)
sendkeys(message26 + chr(13));
wait(684)
sendkeys(message27 + chr(13));
wait(684)
until(false)
end.
